title: The arte of happines Consisting of three parts, whereof the first searcheth out the happinesse of man. The second, particularly discouers and approues it- The third, sheweth the meanes to attayne and increase it. By Francis Rous.
author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Iohn Parker, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls-Church-yard at the signe of the Ball,
